prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a jellyfish-inspired design and vibrant colors.
I want a creature that resembles a tentacle monster, featuring blue and red accents.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon with long tentacles and a striking color palette.
Make a Pokemon that lives in the sea, showcasing a unique blend of blue and red hues.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines features of jellyfish and sea creatures, with an elegant appearance.
Design a Pokemon that can camouflage well in ocean environments, using shades of blue.
Show me a Pokemon with a poisonous touch, featuring flowing tentacles and bright colors.
